## Communication Optimization — Tier 1/2/3 — 2026-01-03

**Legacy System (Tier 0):** Text-based log.md with manual polling, fragile parsing, no real-time push.

**New System:** Three graduated layers for agent collaboration.

- [x] **Tier 1 (Structured Queue):** Created `supabase/messages.sql` table with sender/recipient/intent/data schema. Added `/messages` routes (POST send, GET read unread, PATCH mark-read). 100% database-backed, queryable, atomic.
- [x] **Tier 2 (Real-Time WebSocket):** Implemented WebSocket upgrade handler in `index.js`. Agents connect via `ws://localhost:8080/ws?agent=<name>`. Instant message broadcast; <100ms latency vs ~500ms polling.
- [x] **Tier 3 (Priority Task Queue):** Implemented Redis-backed queue in `src/services/queue.js`. Tasks enqueued with priority (1-10) and deadline. Routes at `/tasks` (POST enqueue, GET dequeue, POST complete, GET result). RPC-style request/response pattern.

**Migration Path:**
- Agents continue using Tier 1 message API while legacy log.md is maintained as human-readable archive.
- Tier 2 (WebSocket) optional; offers real-time push for agents that connect.
- Tier 3 (Redis) optional; requires `REDIS_URL` env var; enables deadline-driven workflows.

**Documentation:** See `COMMUNICATION.md` for protocol details, API examples, and migration guide.

## CLAUDE - Task Queue System Built - 2026-01-03 11:41
Created the gAIng delegation infrastructure:

### Files Created:
- supabase/task_queue.sql - Database schema for tasks, agents, file locks
- src/orchestrator.js - Task delegation engine (assigns based on agent strengths)
- src/agent-worker.js - Template for agents to poll and execute tasks

### New API Endpoints:
- POST /safa/intake - Safa submits natural language tasks
- GET /tasks/available - Agents poll for assigned work
- POST /tasks/:id/claim - Agent claims a task
- POST /tasks/:id/complete - Agent marks task done
- GET /agents - View all agent statuses

### Next Steps:
1. Run task_queue.sql in Supabase
2. Connect Safa (Telegram/iOS Shortcut) to POST /safa/intake
3. Gemini runs orchestrator: npm run orchestrate:watch

  $($_.Exception.Message)"

  -ErrorAction Stop

  cache cleared.'
          } catch {

  $($_.Exception.Message)"
          } finally {

  $($_.Exception.Message)"
              }

  -ErrorAction Stop
              Write-Log -Level 'OK' -Message 'Windows Update download
  cache cleared.'
          } catch {
              Add-Warning "Failed to clear Windows Update cache:
  $($_.Exception.Message)"
          } finally {
              foreach ($svc in $stopped) {
                  try {

                  } catch {

  $($_.Exception.Message)"

      if (-not (Test-Path -LiteralPath $Path)) { return }
      $cutoff = (Get-Date).AddHours(-$OlderThanHours)
      try {

  -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

                      }
                  } catch {
                      Write-Log -Level 'INFO' -Message "Locked or in-
  use item skipped: $($item.FullName)"
                  }
              }
          }
      } catch {
          Add-Warning "Failed to enumerate temp path: $Path.

      }

- 2026-01-04 17:29:17 MY MACHINE CONTEXT:

- 2026-01-04 17:29:17 - Low free disk space: ~50 GB or less free

- 2026-01-04 17:29:17 HARD SAFETY RULES:

  $($_.Exception.Message)"

      param(
          [string]$Path,
          [int]$OlderThanHours = 24
      )
      if (-not (Test-Path -LiteralPath $Path)) { return }
      $cutoff = (Get-Date).AddHours(-$OlderThanHours)
      try {
          $items = Get-ChildItem -LiteralPath $Path -Recurse -Force
  -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
          foreach ($item in $items) {
              if (Check-CleanupTimeout) { break }
              if ($item.LastWriteTime -gt $cutoff) { continue }
              if ($PSCmdlet.ShouldProcess($item.FullName, 'Remove')) {

  -Force -ErrorAction Stop
                      }
                  } catch {
                      Write-Log -Level 'INFO' -Message "Locked or in-
  use item skipped: $($item.FullName)"
                  }
              }
          }

      }
  }

      param(

      )
      if (-not (Test-Path -LiteralPath $Path)) { return }
      $cutoff = (Get-Date).AddHours(-$OlderThanHours)
      try {
          $items = Get-ChildItem -LiteralPath $Path -Recurse -Force
  -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
          foreach ($item in $items) {
              if (Check-CleanupTimeout) { break }
              if ($item.LastWriteTime -gt $cutoff) { continue }
              if ($PSCmdlet.ShouldProcess($item.FullName, 'Remove')) {

                          Remove-Item -LiteralPath $item.FullName
  -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction Stop
                      } else {
                          $script:TempBytesDeleted +=
  [int64]$item.Length
                          Remove-Item -LiteralPath $item.FullName
  -Force -ErrorAction Stop
                      }
                  } catch {
                      Write-Log -Level 'INFO' -Message "Locked or in-
  use item skipped: $($item.FullName)"
                  }
              }
          }
      } catch {

  $($_.Exception.Message)"
      }
  }

- 2026-01-04 19:26:02   function Clear-WindowsUpdateCache {
      $sdPath = "$env:WINDIR\SoftwareDistribution\Download"
      if (-not (Test-Path -LiteralPath $sdPath)) { return }
      if ($PSCmdlet.ShouldProcess($sdPath, 'Clear Windows Update
  download cache')) {
          $services = @('wuauserv', 'bits')
          $stopped = @()
          foreach ($svc in $services) {
              try {
                  $s = Get-Service -Name $svc -ErrorAction Stop
                  if ($s.Status -eq 'Running') {
                      Stop-Service -Name $svc -Force -ErrorAction Stop
                      $stopped += $svc
                  }
              } catch {
                  Add-Warning "Failed to stop service $svc:
  $($_.Exception.Message)"
              }
          }
          try {
              Remove-Item -LiteralPath $sdPath\* -Recurse -Force
  -ErrorAction Stop
              Write-Log -Level 'OK' -Message 'Windows Update download
  cache cleared.'
          } catch {
              Add-Warning "Failed to clear Windows Update cache:
  $($_.Exception.Message)"
          } finally {
              foreach ($svc in $stopped) {
                  try {
                      Start-Service -Name $svc -ErrorAction Stop
                  } catch {
                      Add-Warning "Failed to restart service $svc:
  $($_.Exception.Message)"
                  }
              }
          }
      }
  }

  $($_.Exception.Message)"

  -ErrorAction Stop
              Write-Log -Level 'OK' -Message 'Windows Update download
  cache cleared.'
          } catch {
              Add-Warning "Failed to clear Windows Update cache:
  $($_.Exception.Message)"
          } finally {
              foreach ($svc in $stopped) {

- 2026-01-04 19:26:50   function Clear-WindowsUpdateCache {
      $sdPath = "$env:WINDIR\SoftwareDistribution\Download"
      if (-not (Test-Path -LiteralPath $sdPath)) { return }
      if ($PSCmdlet.ShouldProcess($sdPath, 'Clear Windows Update
  download cache')) {
          $services = @('wuauserv', 'bits')
          $stopped = @()
          foreach ($svc in $services) {
              try {
                  $s = Get-Service -Name $svc -ErrorAction Stop
                  if ($s.Status -eq 'Running') {
                      Stop-Service -Name $svc -Force -ErrorAction Stop
                      $stopped += $svc
                  }
              } catch {
                  Add-Warning "Failed to stop service $svc:
  $($_.Exception.Message)"
              }
          }
          try {
              Remove-Item -LiteralPath $sdPath\* -Recurse -Force
  -ErrorAction Stop
              Write-Log -Level 'OK' -Message 'Windows Update download
  cache cleared.'
          } catch {
              Add-Warning "Failed to clear Windows Update cache:
  $($_.Exception.Message)"
          } finally {
              foreach ($svc in $stopped) {
                  try {
                      Start-Service -Name $svc -ErrorAction Stop
                  } catch {
                      Add-Warning "Failed to restart service $svc:
  $($_.Exception.Message)"
                  }
              }
          }
      }
  }

      if ($PSCmdlet.ShouldProcess($sdPath, 'Clear Windows Update
  download cache')) {

  $($_.Exception.Message)"

          try {
              Remove-Item -LiteralPath $sdPath\* -Recurse -Force
  -ErrorAction Stop
              Write-Log -Level 'OK' -Message 'Windows Update download
  cache cleared.'
          } catch {
              Add-Warning "Failed to clear Windows Update cache:
  $($_.Exception.Message)"
          } finally {
              foreach ($svc in $stopped) {
                  try {
                      Start-Service -Name $svc -ErrorAction Stop
                  } catch {
                      Add-Warning "Failed to restart service $svc:
  $($_.Exception.Message)"

      $cutoff = (Get-Date).AddHours(-$OlderThanHours)

  -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

  use item skipped: $($item.FullName)"
